code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Checkout(_ref){let{cart,setCart}=_ref;const total=cart.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.price*item.quantity,0);const handleRemove=idx=>{const newCart=[...cart];newCart.splice(idx,1);setCart(newCart);};const handleQuantityChange=(idx,qty)=>{const newCart=[...cart];newCart[idx].quantity=parseInt(qty)||1;setCart(newCart);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Checkout"}),cart.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Cart is empty"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cart.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.name," - $",item.price," x",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:item.quantity,min:"1",onChange:e=>handleQuantityChange(idx,e.target.value),style:{width:50,marginLeft:5,marginRight:5}}),"= $",item.price*item.quantity,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleRemove(idx),style:{marginLeft:10,color:'red'},children:"Remove"})]},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["Total: $",total]})})]});}export default Checkout;
